_header: O Lord that art Maker and Creator
_description: The hymn ‘Deus creator omnium’ — eight stanzas rhyme royal

BLAdd34193.First Lines:
O lord þat art maker and creatureOf thynges all o lord
                    omnipotent…
BLAdd34193.Last Lines:
…Oo lord oo god thowgh in persons threeIn substance oone and
                    oone in deite. Amene.
BLAdd34193.Editions:
Patterson,  Frank A. 
             “Hymnal from MS. Additional 34193, British Museum.” 
             Medieval Studies in Memory of Gertrude Schoepperle Loomis.
            Roger Sherman Loomis, ed. 
         New York: Columbia UP, 1927: 443-88: 464-7.
